SEARCH
Package humans

Class Human

java.lang.Object
humans.Human
Direct Known Subclasses:
Patient, Staff
public abstract class Human extends Object
Represents a general human entity in the insurance system. This serves as a base class for patients, doctors and other human-related roles. Attributes include general information (like name, date of birth, NRIC/FIN), which are commonly found in SingPass, HealthHub and staff onboarding procedures and patient-provided information.
